description: The strongest tactician of the Athos. She is a strong muscled woman who wears a nun uniform, known as Big Ma`am. Her real name is Nikuma. Nikuma is a burly woman and the best strategist of Athos according to Teresa. Referred to as "Hell`s Dairy Cow" by Teresa, she is a master tactician and trainer for the Qwasers of Athos. She also handles the occasional training of the group of Qwasers at the St. Mihailov Academy. She has a military attitude and is harsh in her methods, but despite this she has the best intentions.
name: Big Mom
